value.title: Machine learning model from the largest US COVID-19 dataset predicts disease severity
value.excerpt: The study, published in the journal JAMA Network Open, looked at risk factors for severe cases of COVID-19 and traced the progression of the disease over time. value.title: Don’t trust reported TOPS metrics for deep learning

value.title: New cheat software claims to work on ‘any console’ via machine learning
value.excerpt: A new piece of cheat software claims to utilise machine learning to allow players to use auto aim on “any console”. The software, which was highlighted by anti-cheat group ACPD, reportedly utilises PC passthrough via network streaming or a capture card to bypass console platform security.
